ValidationRule.description: P-Go should be greater than 0 and less than 100
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), OR( Program_Go_Probability__c > 1.0, Program_Go_Probability__c < 0.0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Program Go Probability (P-GO) should be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100
